com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.sort

Class Sort

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.sort.Sort
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bogosort, Bubble, Insertion, Merge, Quicksort, Selection

    public abstract class Sort
extends Object
    Sort class that implements different algorithms and utilities for sorting.
    Version:
    0.1.3.5
    Author:
    Miguel Velez - miguelvelezmj25

    • Method Detail

      • isSorted

        public static <E extends Comparable<E>> boolean isSorted(E[] array)
        Check if the array is sorted. It loops through the entire array once, checking that the elements are sorted.

        Runtime: O(n)
        Type Parameters:
        E - - the type of elements in this array.
        Parameters:
        array - - the array to check
        Returns:
        true if the array is sorted, else false.
